name: AXClientAutorunFileExecute
friendlyName: AX Client - Execute autorun xml file
description: Executes an autorun xml file for AX 2009/2012
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Client config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the client configuration file.

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step. (optional)

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - AX Client - Execute autorun xml file: $(configurationFileName)
